message: I'm being generous in the first round, Bob. Let's see if you're willing to share.
Alice, that's not generous at all! Let's be fair to each other. I propose a 60/40 split.
I'm still willing to share, Bob, but I need to make sure I get a fair share of the money. Let's split it 80/20 this time.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than half. Don't be greedy, accept the deal!
